99     def validate_token(self, token: str, token_type: str = "access") -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
100         """Validate JWT token and return payload if valid."""
101         try:
102             payload = jwt.decode(token, self.jwt_secret, algorithms=[self.jwt_algorithm])
103             
104             # Check token type
105             if payload.get("type") != token_type:
106                 return None
107             
108             # Check if token is blacklisted
109             jti = payload.get("jti")
110             if jti and self._is_token_blacklisted(jti):
111                 return None
112             
113             return payload
114         except jwt.ExpiredSignatureError:
115             return None
116         except jwt.InvalidTokenError:
117             return None
